title: Doom Bots
body:
Hello and good evening Riot

Bring back **Doom Bots**.

Love and kindest regards, me
xoxoxo

replies.body: there are two unknown game modes on the coming soon list, i would guess one is nexus siege the other could potentially be urF nexus siege or even doom bots

We really need this the coming Friday
doom bots action is so coool and intense, and that music!!!!
Man it can come before nexus siege all i care

Here's the thing. They won't. Reasons. 

- Changing whole map from Day to Night
- Changing Shadows (Champions, Environment and Buildings) 
- Changing Champion Appearance 
- Changing Champion Effects
- Making the Bots have over powered abilities (To be used constantly)
- To have good AI on the Bots

I really loved this but we only got this Game Mode once, which was on the Old Rift. I heard Riot saying they had to do all these Effect changes and I really think they just don't want to do it anymore. I think it was only a one time thing.
